thread.title: Pittsburgh rabbi to work as Jewish Federation scholar in charge of adult education
thread.title_full: Pittsburgh rabbi to work as Jewish Federation scholar in charge of adult education

title: Pittsburgh rabbi to work as Jewish Federation scholar in charge of adult education
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post - Today 
Rabbi Danny Schiff was quietly observing Shabbat — the Jewish Sabbath — in Pittsburgh when Prime Minister Yitzhak Rabin was assassinated...
